channel.title: Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee
channel.description: Recent content on Tommy Tsz-Ming Lee

item.title: Papers
item.description: Manuscripts (Email me for a draft; comments are most welcome!) Under revision. Asymmetries in doubling and Cyclic Linearization. To appear. Strength in deontic modals as acceptability and optimality. NACCL 32. In prep. Licensing VP movement and ellipsis in Mandarin and Cantonese. [with Victor Junnan Pan] In prep. Epistemic indefinites in Cantonese: a case study of mzi In prep. Hyperraising, evidentiality and phase deactivation. [with Ka-Fai Yip]

item.title: Presentations
item.description: (Email me if you want the handout of any presentation.) here. -- 2020. TITLE, at CONFERENCE, UNI. -- 2021 Specific unknowns: a case study of epistemic indefinites in Cantonese, at LSA 2021. Online. 2020 Indirect evidence as a licensing condition of hyperraising in Cantonese and Vietnamese, at BCGL 13, CRISSP (online). [with Ka-Fai Yip] Movement of quantificational heads, at NELS 51, UQAM (online). Strength in deontic modals as acceptability and optimality, at NACCL-32, UConn (online).
